programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: In Goode, Virginia, a 50-year age gap proves a nightmare for a wealthy retired businessman and his violent girlfriend. In Austin, Texas, a millionaire wakes up and thinks his stomach has simply torn apart but then discovers he's been shot.

programme.title: Momma Knows Best
programme.desc: In Merrillville, Indiana, there are deadly secrets between family members, while near Manchester, England, a late night flower delivery proves a test run for murder.

programme.title: Aim To Maim
programme.desc: In Kansas City, Missouri, a married woman falls for a street hustler and pays a devastating price. In Castlerock, Northern Ireland, a married dentist falls for a patient, and comes up with an unusual treatment plan to secure a fresh start.

programme.title: Deadly Games
programme.desc: In Westchester County, New York, a wife begins a fling with a coworker which leads to an erotic game with a violent conclusion. In Wellesley, Massachusetts, a murder in a public park appears be the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: Operation Shi-Ron: Corrupt Cops
programme.desc: FBI agent Herman Groman takes on the dangerous assignment of infiltrating crooked cops in Cleveland, Ohio. Herman sets up an illegal gambling operation to snare the cops who offer him protection. But the police are trained to detect deception and the agent is asked to drop his pants while he's fully wired up with surveillance. Will Herman have to shoot his way out of the deal before the case comes to a conclusion?

programme.title: Operation Drug Cartels
programme.desc: Saratoga, FL agent Jim Sweeting sails the Caribbean to infiltrate and break the Cayman cartel drug operation. US Customs supervisor Bill Gately uncovers a can of worms with the Mexican banking system, that's bank rolling South American cartels. And DEA agent Louis Diaz joins the Medellin cartel to take down the drug kingpins raking in millions.

programme.title: Operation Rollo Tomassi: Kaika Klan Outlaws
programme.desc: FBI agent Jim Nice partners with the Akron Police to target the Kaika Klan Outlaws, a black street gang that's terrorizing the city. But Jim is white, and this won't be a cake walk. When the gang decides to eliminate the liability that Jim brings to their drug operation, they target him. Can he talk his way out of a drug deal gone bad, or will he end up dumped in the gutter and dead?

The investigation into the homicide uncovers a sordid tale of double lives, sadomasochism and a callous murder-for-hire scheme involving a mentally handicapped handyman.

programme.title: The House Of Horrors
programme.desc: A former army medic devises a sick plan to kidnap women, impregnate them and keep them in his basement as part of a personal baby farm. When the plans turn to actions, two women lose their lives and four others experience the hell of a veritable house of horrors.

programme.title: Target 7 Investigation: Broken Border

programme.title: Finding Adventure

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy

programme.desc: From a para track and field star, to members of an elite octogenarian rowing team and a once-in-a-generation female quarterback, these groundbreaking athletes are 'Boston Strong.'

programme.desc: Dannys a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But hes been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no ones been able to give him teeth he wont break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: In Free Spirit, award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the citys unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each others signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponents creation.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: Amanda Machon meets with a different guest each episode who will show off their favorite spots in Albuquerque and the best way to experience this one-of-a-kind city. This series is all about discovering everything that makes ABQ unique and exciting.

programme.title: KOAT Celebrates 70 Years
programme.desc: For 70 years KOAT has been part of your family. Youve let us into your homes, to bring you the news that matters most. In this special program, we bring back those familiar faces to revisit some of the biggest stories we have covered over 7 decades.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each others signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponents creation.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Hurricane Michael
programme.desc: A look at how rebuilding efforts are going for Florida families that lost everything in the category 5 Hurricane Michael that made landfall in the FL panhandle on October 7, 2018. The episode goes into the complicated insurance process and how disasters price out people that used to live there. Several FL stations' coverage and talent featured in the episode.

programme.title: Station Nightclub Fire
programme.desc: A survivor reflects on The Station nightclub fire on February 20, 2003 in West Warwick, Rhode Island. One hundred people died and more than 200 were injured. The fire was sparked by pyrotechnics that went off during metal band, Great White's performance. The episode looks at who did and didn't take responsibility for the fire and fire code safety measures that have changed since.

programme.title: Deadly Games
programme.desc: In Westchester County, New York, a wife begins a fling with a coworker which leads to an erotic game with a violent conclusion. In Wellesley, Massachusetts, a murder in a public park appears be the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: Operation Shi-Ron: Corrupt Cops
programme.desc: FBI agent Herman Groman takes on the dangerous assignment of infiltrating crooked cops in Cleveland, Ohio. Herman sets up an illegal gambling operation to snare the cops who offer him protection. But the police are trained to detect deception and the agent is asked to drop his pants while he's fully wired up with surveillance. Will Herman have to shoot his way out of the deal before the case comes to a conclusion?

programme.title: Operation Drug Cartels
programme.desc: Saratoga, FL agent Jim Sweeting sails the Caribbean to infiltrate and break the Cayman cartel drug operation. US Customs supervisor Bill Gately uncovers a can of worms with the Mexican banking system, that's bank rolling South American cartels. And DEA agent Louis Diaz joins the Medellin cartel to take down the drug kingpins raking in millions.

programme.title: Operation Rollo Tomassi: Kaika Klan Outlaws
programme.desc: FBI agent Jim Nice partners with the Akron Police to target the Kaika Klan Outlaws, a black street gang that's terrorizing the city. But Jim is white, and this won't be a cake walk. When the gang decides to eliminate the liability that Jim brings to their drug operation, they target him. Can he talk his way out of a drug deal gone bad, or will he end up dumped in the gutter and dead?

programme.title: Operation End Of Days: Meth Eradication
programme.desc: When Independence, Missouri cop Steve Cook stumbles upon a meth lab, an undercover operation is launched with Steve as the point men. Problem is, Independence is a small town and Steve gets getting made as a cop. Somehow, he manages to deny he's law enforcement but sooner or later, his number will come up. Can Steve wrap up the meth operation before someone puts a bullet in his head?
